name: A small world lost in a big universe
name_original: A small world lost in a big universe
description:
You're a small planet in a big universe. Your soulmate has vanished and you've to travel around to search for her/him.

Helped by a big alien, you'll have to collect ressources to continue your journey and find blue stars to open intergallactic doors, and maybe get your lover back.

Made with construct 2 in less than 48h for the 38th Ludum Dare with the theme "A small World".

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/a-small-world-lost-in-a-big-universe
